mapper.insert: insert into daily_stop (daily_stop_id, date, train_code, `index`, name, arrival_time, departure_time) values (#{dailyStopId}, #{date}, #{trainCode}, #{index}, #{name}, #{arrivalTime}, #{departureTime})
mapper.delete: delete from daily_stop where date = #{date} and train_code = #{trainCode}
mapper.select: select count(*) from daily_stop where date = #{date} and train_code = #{trainCode}

select t1.date as date, t1.train_code as train_code, t1.name as start_stop, t1.departure_time as start_time, t1.index as start_stop_index, t2.name as end_stop, t2.arrival_time as end_time, t2.index as end_stop_index from (select * from daily_stop where DATE(departure_time) = #{date} and name = #{startStop}) as t1 join (select * from daily_stop where name = #{endStop}) as t2 on t1.date = t2.date and t1.train_code = t2.train_code where t1.index < t2.index
